title: Grievous Wounds
body: Executioner's calling is back but I think it needs a tweak as Morrello's offers grievous wound at %40 and below exec. just dishes it out str8 away away...lil unfair for us mundo's out there. Thoughts?

replies.body:
Galio player here <-- gotta say the grievous wounds on the last whisper thing is seriously WTF...

bulwark in ult was next to useless and completely negated him with just one item.
I like player diversity but to the extent where you are beyond useless in a single item with an instant grievous wounds seems a little bit much.

It's worth keeping in mind the opportunity cost for the ADC for building Mortal Reminder
 - they're probably not going to take it as their first item, but it's likely going to replace something like Lord Dominic's Regards (especially),  Bloodthirster, Mercurial Scimitar or Death's Dance. This is less the case for Morello's is it directly gives pretty much all the stats and abilities a mage wants, and the grevious wound effect is just icing. 

I'm not sure if this is going to be a significant impact (haven't played enough games yet!) but it seems that forcing the ADC to move to a less optimal path for the rest of the team might help.
Pretty sure the 800 gold Executioner's calling has the grievous wounds effect too.
